long_description: The Kleen Kanteen Print Lid makes it easy to take your favorite drink with you on the road. Just twist to open and sip, or use the center straw port if you hate the thought of spilling your smoothie. BPA-free polypropylene cap is easy to grip and seals tightly; converts container into a splashproof to-go cup. Lid is compatible with Kleen Kanteen Stainless Steel Pint Cup (sold separately). Please note this cap is not leakproof.
short_description: The Kleen Kanteen Print Lid makes it easy to take your favorite drink with you on the road. Just twist to open and sip, or use the center straw port if you hate the thought of spilling your smoothie.
